name: Cake Assembly Plant
description:
Cake Assembly Plant is a time management game designed to be played on cell phones and tablets. 

Match and deliver the orders  by assembling the cakes in the right order with the right chocolate or sugary toppings.

Choose from these settings:

  • Timed mode
  • Untimed mode
  • Casual Mode
  • Expert Mode (everything moves faster)

Earn  bonus cards:

  • A Patience card is earned by achieving gold - apply it to an order to stop time. (Timed Mode only)
  • A mistake card is earned by recycling  less than 4 products per level  - apply to an order to allow a wrong colour, shape or topping.

Duration and Levels:

Play 50 levels with 7 different layouts.  Keep up as more orders, more colours, shapes and layers are added.  Replay any level to earn gold or to earn more bonus cards.  

In casual mode this game will take approximately 9 hours to play through. 

Instructions / Tutorials 

There is a screen with detailed instructions on how to play and a short tutorial that will show you step-by-step what to do.
